member.name: T:joints_ext.TorqueCalc
member.summary: Provides torque and bolted joint calculation functions. Includes basic torque calculations and VDI 2230 standard calculations for systematic design of highly stressed bolted joints.
member.remarks: VDI 2230 calculations based on VDI 2230 Part 1 (2015) - Systematic calculation of highly stressed bolted joints.

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.StressArea(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the stress area of a threaded fastener according to ISO 898-1.

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.Torque1(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the required tightening torque using the general torque equation.
member.param: Bearing surface inner diameter in mm
Bearing surface outer diameter in mm
Thread flank angle in degrees (typically 30° for metric threads)

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.LoadAxial(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the axial load from allowed stress and stress area.

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.validateBolt(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Validates bolt strength using surface failure criteria.

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.CalculateClamping(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates clamping force from torque using simplified formula.

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.VDI_BoltResilience(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the resilience (compliance) of the bolt according to VDI 2230.

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.VDI_ClampedPartsResilience(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the resilience of clamped parts according to VDI 2230. Uses the substitute area approach for complex geometries.
member.param: Washer diameter or bearing surface diameter in mm
Modulus of elasticity of clamped material in N/mm²

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.VDI_LoadFactor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the load factor (load introduction factor) according to VDI 2230.

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.VDI_BoltForceWorking(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the bolt force under working load according to VDI 2230.
member.returns: Bolt force under working load in N

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.VDI_ClampingForceWorking(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the clamping force under working load according to VDI 2230.
member.returns: Clamping force under working load in N

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.VDI_AssemblyPreload(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the assembly preload force according to VDI 2230.
member.param: Assembly preload from torque tables in N
Thermal expansion coefficient of clamped parts (1/K)

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.VDI_TighteningTorque(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the tightening torque according to VDI 2230.

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.VDI_MinimumPreload(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the minimum required preload force according to VDI 2230.

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.VDI_BoltStress(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the stress in the bolt at the thread according to VDI 2230.

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.VDI_UtilizationFactor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the utilization factor (safety factor) according to VDI 2230.
member.param: Yield strength (0.2% proof stress) in MPa
member.returns: Utilization factor (should be less than 0.9 for static loads)

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.VDI_EccentricLoadingFactor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the eccentric loading factor according to VDI 2230.
member.param: Exponent based on load type (n=1 for pressure, n=4-8 for bending)
Outer diameter of load introduction in mm

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.VDI_EmbeddingLoss(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the embedding/settling loss according to VDI 2230.
member.param: Embedding factor (typically 3-5 µm for fine machined surfaces)
member.returns: Preload loss due to embedding in N

member.name: M:joints_ext.TorqueCalc.VDI_EffectivePreloadTorque(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the prevailing torque for locking elements according to VDI 2230.
